Posts.Content: Hi molly I feel for you hun I think the worse thing is the waiting for everything, have you had a good talk with your breast nurse, my always makes me feel better, I don't really understand the results the way I looked at it was if it was in a certain number it was a definite yes to treatment, or in the range of no treatment Or grey area where it has to be sent a way, I'm a little further on I think only by a few weeks had the same as you  boob of I had  in plant put in and have to say is much better now, was uncomfortable for some time and thought it would always be like it, so I'm sure in time it will heal and feel comfortable again, it's the waiting, I think what ever they tell us we will always worry now even if we had the full works boob off chemo and the radio and pills, we will always worry, we have to try to believe what they say is the best thing, the good thing now is we are aware if everybump and we will have checks more which is only a good thing hope you feel a bit better about it all soon it should be called the emotional scruw up disease xx bug hugs Helen x
Posts.Title: Concerned about treatment plan.

Posts.Content: Hi molly I feel for you hun I think the worse thing is the waiting for everything, have you had a good talk with your breast nurse, my always makes me feel better, I don't really understand the results the way I looked at it was if it was in a certain number it was a definite yes to treatment, or in the range of no treatment Or grey area where it has to be sent a way, I'm a little further on I think only by a few weeks had the same as you  boob of I had  in plant put in and have to say is much better now, was uncomfortable for some time and thought it would always be like it, so I'm sure in time it will heal and feel comfortable again, it's the waiting, I think what ever they tell us we will always worry now even if we had the full works boob off chemo and the radio and pills, we will always worry, we have to try to believe what they say is the best thing, the good thing now is we are aware if everybump and we will have checks more which is only a good thing hope you feel a bit better about it all soon it should be called the emotional scruw up disease xx bug hugs Helen x
Posts.Title: Concerned about treatment plan.

Posts.Content: Hi Jo I had to reply to this as your results are very much like  mine I think apart from I am her2 negative but every thing else is the same D C I S  present, grade the same, nodes clear I'm not sure yet if I'm having chemo as my boob has been sent away for Christmas to America so awaiting the results, I'm kind of hoping I don't have to have it, but if I do there is not much we can do about it have you started your treatment yet and hows it going I'm sure we all think its much worse than it might be HELEN X
